Detailed Description

template<class Key, class Data>
class CrissCross::Data::RedBlackTree< Key, Data >

A very fast red-black tree implementation.

Definition at line 78 of file rbtree.h.

template<class Key, class Data>
statusEnum CrissCross::Data::RedBlackTree< Key, Data >::erase ( Key const &  _key  ) 

Deletes a node from the tree, specified by the node's key.

This won't free the memory occupied by the data, so the data must be freed seperately.

Parameters:
_key The key of the node to delete.
Returns:
A value indicating the result of the request.
See also:

Deletes a node from the tree, specified by the node's key and data.

This won't free the memory occupied by the data, so the data must be freed seperately.
